original_title: MediaDefined Pvt Ltd wins top awards at Commonwealth Business Excellence
original_body_lines: MediaDefined Pvt Ltd, an ICT solutions company in Sri Lanka, won the “Best International Collaboration Company/Project of the Year 2024” for Learning and Development at the Commonwealth Business Excellence Awards for the second consecutive year. The ceremony was held at Emperors Palace in Johannesburg. Director L. A. D. E. Vipul Perera also received the ‘Best CEO/Director of the Year 2024’ award in technology for Learning and Development, marking his second consecutive win. Founded in 2007, MediaDefined Pvt Ltd is a subsidiary of MediaDefined Inc, Dallas.
It was founded by Himansu Karunadasa, Vipul Perera, Prof. J. T. F. De Silva (Former General Manager), and three accomplished software engineers.
